title: Partner Network | Phoenix Technologies
meta_description: The Phoenix Technologies Partner Ecosystem fosters a collaborative network of Technology Partners, Service Providers and Visionaries to leverage Cloud and AI capabilities with a focus on security, efficiency, and scalability.

headings.text: We Make AI Work For You

main_content: Phoenix Technologies Partner Network Let's shape the future of AI and Cloud innovation in a secure, sovereign, and sustainable manner together. Become a Partner Download  (undefined, 0 B) Partners Technology Partner Dell Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals shape their future digitally and transform workplaces and personal lives. The company offers customers the industry's most comprehensive and innovative technology and services portfolio for the AI era. Solution Partner German Edge Cloud German Edge Cloud, specializes in secure, real-time solutions for the manufacturing industry. The ONCITE Digital Production System connects operational technology with AI to enable transparent, efficient production. GEC’s solutions provide data-driven processes and ensure full data sovereignty. Infrastructure Partner Green Green is the leading data center provider in Switzerland. The company operates six data centers at four locations in the greater Zurich area. Handelskammer beider Basel As the voice of business and driving force, the Chamber of Commerce of both Basel promotes our business location. More than 2,100 members form the basis of our work and make us the largest bicantonal trade association in Northwestern Switzerland. Technology Partner IBM IBM integrates technology and expertise, providing infrastructure, software and consulting services to clients driving the digital transformation of the world's business-critical organisations. Education ICT Scouts The aim is to find, promote and mediate ICT talents of young people. Particular emphasis is placed on diversity. Service Provider itnb ITNB AG redifines the future of AI and Cybersecurity solutions with a commitment to safety, compliance, and innovation. With a presence across Switzerland and partnerships in Southeast Asia, ITNB specializes in delivering secure and scalable solutions tailored to business needs. Solution Partner Multiverse Computing Multiverse Computing is a Spanish quantum computing software company headquartered in San Sebastián, Spain, with offices in Paris, Munich, London, Toronto and Sherbrooke, Canada. Infrastructure Partner NorthC NorthC is a market leader in regional data centers and most reliable provider of colocation and connectivity services with the best digital ecosystem in the Netherlands, Germany and Switzerland. Venture Studio QAI Ventures QAI Ventures, a venture capital and accelerator headquartered in Basel, Switzerland, is dedicated to advancing global quantum technology innovation. Technology Partner Red Hat Red Hat is the leading provider of enterprise open source software solution. Enterprises around the world trust the hybrid cloud infrastructure, application services, cloud-native application development, and automation solutions from Red Hat. Service Provider Switzerland Innovation Park Basel Area The Switzerland Innovation Park Basel Area is one of five sites in Switzerland Innovation’s network of science parks. At its four sites Allschwil, Basel, and Novartis Campus in Basel, the Switzerland Innovation Park Basel Area offers a total usable space of 9,432 m2. Strategic Partner Quantum Basel QuantumBasel, is at the forefront of quantum computing and AI. As part of the uptownBasel Innovation Hub, Quantum Basel provides access to quantum expertise and quantum technologies, enabling companies, researchers and startups to harness the power of quantum computing for real-world applications. Strategic Partner uptown Basel uptownBasel is an international centre of excellence for Industry 4.0. On the historic Schoren site in Arlesheim, near Basel, we are creating a development and production location that will be home to selected technology companies and other organisations. Reasons to join the Ecosystem Complementary Ecosystem Leverage a vibrant network of complementary services and solutions, opening doors to collaborative opportunities and expanding your market reach. Support the Local Strengthen ties within the local community, fostering mutual growth, and contributing to the technological evolution of the region. Co-Creation from Day One From the get-go, engage in a collaborative environment where your insights and offerings shape cutting-edge solutions for the market. Build on Sovereignty Harness the trust and credibility of adhering to Swiss data protection standards, positioning your offerings as premium and secure. Become a Phoenix Partner Contact us, if you want to become a partner.
